item.Q:
Write the character:
to send out; to show (one's feeling); to issue; to develop; (classifier for gunshots, "rounds")
item.A:
traditional: 發
fā
发展 (發展) fāzhǎn development; growth; to develop; to grow; to expand

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: earth; ground; field; place; land
2: (used after an adjective or a phrase to form an adverbial adjunct before the verb); -ly
item.A:
1: dì 2: de
地区 (地區) dìqū area; region 暗地里 (暗地裡) àndelǐ secretly; inwardly; on the sly

item.Q:
Write the character:
law; method; way; Buddhist teaching; Legalist; abbr. for France
item.A:
fǎ
方法 fāngfǎ method; way; means

item.Q:
Write the character:
-less; not to have; no; none; not; to lack; un-
item.A:
traditional: 無
wú
无产阶级 (無產階級) wúchǎnjiējí proletariat

item.Q:
Write the character:
correct; right; so; thus; like this; -ly
item.A:
rán
然后 (然後) ránhòu after; then (afterwards); after that; afterwards

item.Q:
Write the character:
but; yet; however; only; merely; still
item.A:
dàn
但是 dànshì but; however

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: to be; to act as; manage; withstand; when; during; ought; should; match equally; equal; same; obstruct; just at (a time or place); on the spot; right; just at
2: at or in the very same...; to pawn; suitable; adequate; fitting; proper; replace; represent
item.A:
traditional: 當
1: dāng 2: dàng
当时 (當時) dāngshí then; at that time; while 适当 (適當) shìdàng suitable; appropriate

item.Q:
Write the character:
in; at; to; from; by; than; out of
item.A:
traditional: 於
yú
于是 (於是) yúshì thereupon; as a result; consequently; thus; hence

traditional: 嗎
1: ma 2: mǎ
吗啡 (嗎啡) mafēi joy-powder 吗啡 (嗎啡) mǎfēi morphine

item.Q:
Write the character:
roots or stems of plants; origin; source; this; the current; root; foundation; basis; (classifier for books, periodicals, files etc)
item.A:
běn
基本 jīběn basic; fundamental; main; elementary

nián
青年 qīngnián youth

item.Q:
Write the character:
appear; present; now; existing; current
item.A:
traditional: 現
xiàn
现在 (現在) xiànzài now; at present; modern; current; nowadays

item.Q:
Write the character:
before; in front; ago; former; previous; earlier; front
item.A:
qián
目前 mùqián at the present time; currently

zuì
最后 (最後) zuìhòu final; last; finally; ultimate

zhēn
真正 zhēnzhèng real; true; genuine

xīn
重新 chóngxīn again; once more; re-

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: and; together with; with; sum; union; peace; harmony; surname
2: soft; warm
3: cap (a poem); respond in singing
item.A:
1: hé 2: huó 3: hè
和平 hépíng peace 暖和 nuǎnhuó warm; nice and warm 附和 fùhè (v) repeat in agreement (actions; words)

yīn
因此 yīncǐ that is why; for that reason; therefore; for this reason

guǒ
如果 rúguǒ if; in case; in the event that

cap (a poem); respond in singing
附和 fùhè (v) repeat in agreement (actions; words)

item.Q:

(yīncǐ de yīn)

cause; reason; because
因此 yīncǐ that is why; for that reason; therefore; for this reason

item.Q:

(rúguǒ de guǒ)

fruit; result

item.Q:
Write the character: yì
(zhùyì de yì)
item.A:
idea; meaning; wish; desire; intention; (abbr.) Italy
注意 zhùyì take note of; (pay) attention (to)
rúguǒ if; in case; in the event that

traditional: 因為
yīnwèi because; owing to; on account of
dànshì but; however

traditional: 發生
fāshēng to happen; to occur; to take place

traditional: 現在
xiànzài now; at present; modern; current; nowadays

traditional: 出現
chūxiàn to appear; to arise; to emerge

traditional: 當時
dāngshí then; at that time; while

traditional: 然後
ránhòu after; then (afterwards); after that; afterwards
zìrán nature; natural; naturally

traditional: 最後
zuìhòu final; last; finally; ultimate

traditional: 發現
fāxiàn to find; to discover
yīnér therefore; as a result; thus; and as a result, ...
zuìdà biggest; largest; maximum

traditional: 當然
dāngrán only natural; as it should be; certainly; of course; without doubt
yǐqián before; formerly; previous

traditional: 年來
niánlái over the last ... years

traditional: 於是
yúshì thereupon; as a result; consequently; thus; hence

traditional: 法國
Fǎguó France; French
qùnián last year

traditional: 資本
zīběn capital (as in capitalism)
